name: Eggspiration Date
description:
A 3D platformer game about finding eggs and getting them to safety before they grow moldy. You play as a cute seagull that has arrived on a deserted island. The island is full of eggs that have been stolen from their nest. Your task is to return the eggs to safety. Watch out for sneaky terns that often steal eggs for lunch.

The game has been heavily inspired by classic 3D platformers like Spyro and Crash Bandicoot.

Game features

  • Snappy controls. Jump and glide around like a real seagull.
  • A beautiful, hand-crafted island to explore.
  • A homage to old classic 3D platformers like Spyro and Crash Bandicoot.

How to play

WASD to move. Space to jump and fly. Mouse to turn the camera. 

Controllers are also supported but not in menus.

Collect eggs and stash them in nests before they grow moldy.

Team

Game Design and Programming - F1nde and Nash
Character modeling, rigging, and animation - Nash

Attributions

Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/) - for tree, rock, and fence 3D models and sound effects
InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) - for the sea ambient sounds
George Edward Purdy - The Cartoonist Kooky font
